comments: A054374 gives the discriminants of the Hermite polynomials in the conventional (physicists') normalization, and A002109 gives the discriminants of the Hermite polynomials in the (in my opinion more natural) probabilists' normalization. See refs Wikipedia and Szego eq. (6.71.7). - Alan Sokal, Mar 02 2012
references: Mohammad K. Azarian, On the Hyperfactorial Function, Hypertriangular Function, and the Discriminants of Certain Polynomials, International Journal of Pure and Applied Mathematics, Vol. 36, No. 2, 2007, pp. 251-257.  Mathematical Reviews, MR2312537.  Zentralblatt MATH, Zbl 1133.11012.
G. Szego, Orthogonal Polynomials, American Mathematical Society, 1981 edition, 432 Pages.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Hermite Polynomial.
Index entries for sequences related to Hermite polynomials
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
